content: In Chapter 3 of the game, you may have already visited The Great Pagoda. This is where tapestries are hung after you've completed chapters of the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 6', specifically from the subsection 'Erlang, the Sacred Divinity'.
The content is as follows:
In Chapter 3 of the game, you may have already visited The Great Pagoda. This is where tapestries are hung after you've completed chapters of the game.
